"}]}]}]}], "schemeDefinitions": [], "eligibilityCriteria": {"eligibilityDescription_md": "**Eligibility** The eligibility criteria for applying under this scheme shall be as follows: (1) The student should have been enrolled on an undergraduate programme in any of the Delhi State Public Universities or colleges/ institutes affiliated with Delhi State Public Universities. (2) The student should fulfil the income/ economic and academic performance criteria as specified for each category mentioned below
